message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $13,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $13,500.  This product is in high demand and I know its worth.

I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the current market situation and my budget constraints, I am unable to meet your latest offer of $13,500. I would like to propose $13,000 as the maximum amount I am willing to pay for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
